attributes.action: Tackle the racism from the EU Ref. by British far-right radicals and neo-nazis
attributes.additional_details:
At times like these that citizens must unite against a greater evil. It must be shown that this behaviour is not representative of the entire British population, nor that we condone it. 

The elitist political leaders are no better than the media - Johnson's false claims against Turkey, Farage's "breaking point" poster, and Cameron's claims on "swarms" of migrants. 

A simple written reply from the government is not acceptable in this circumstance. Action must be taken.
attributes.background: Many factors played into the "Brexit" campaign, a major one of which was immigration. Since the announcement of a Leave win, and mainstream media coverage, racism has soared. It is clear that a more definite action is needed to cease this hate fuelled conduct.
